availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles Welles Stewart (Kenton County, Kentucky, bank teller.)

body.p: Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, bank teller. Ohio native. Married to Mary E. Foley Stewart in Clark County, Kentucky, on February 13, 1861. Father of Joseph Wray Stewart and Charles Foley Stewart. Bank teller in Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, in 1860. Bank teller in Kenton County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, Ward 4, p. 656.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington/Ward 4, p. 143A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Kenton County, KY, June and July 1863, p. 207.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Clark County Marriages, Film #004011614.
